title: Climate Watch Long-term Strategies Explorer

cautions:
All data collected in this database comes strictly from the LTS submissions only. No evaluation of ambition has been undertaken. Rather the database is provided to facilitate transparency and understanding of countries' long-term strategies.
For Ã¢â‚¬Å“legal backing,Ã¢â‚¬Â full legal backing means that the long-term target and the development of the LTS are mandated by law, partial legal backing means one of the two, and no legal backing means neither. For additional information on the methodology behind the indicators, please refer to WRI publication "Insights on the First 29 Long-term Climate Strategies Submitted to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change".
date_of_content: First published 2020, update as new LTS submissions are made available
